generated_text:

- sidewalk: There is a sidewalk on the right side of the image, adjacent to the building, with pedestrians walking on it.
- building: The structure on the right side of the image, with large pillars and glass windows, is a building.

- sky: The upper part of the image shows a partly cloudy sky.

- truck: A large truck is visible on the right side of the road, partially obscured by the building.
- traffic light: A red traffic light is visible in the distance, controlling the flow of traffic.
- traffic sign: Several traffic signs are visible, including a blue directional sign and a yellow warning sign.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- fence: A fence is visible on the left side of the image, separating the road from a green area.
